items.sentence: I hope I can spend more time doing that now that I'm retired.
It's a good thing that we didn't try to do that by ourselves.
The house where my father was born is just around the corner.
Tom has been in there talking to the boss for an hour or two.
Let's stop arguing about this and get to what really matters.
The yolk is the yellow part; the egg white is the white part.
Have you decided where you're going for your summer vacation?
I'm lucky to have some savings I can use at a time like this.
What makes you think that Tom is still a high school student?
Tom says he always has at least three hundred dollars on him.
